Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.tools

Log4j 2 command line tools.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
Generate Generates source code for custom or extended logger wrappers.
Generate.CustomLogger Generates source code for custom logger wrappers that only provide convenience methods for the specified custom levels, not for the standard built-in levels.
Generate.ExtendedLogger Generates source code for extended logger wrappers that provide convenience methods for the specified custom levels, and by extending org.apache.logging.log4j.spi.ExtendedLoggerWrapper, inherit the convenience methods for the built-in levels provided by the Logger interface.
 

Package org.apache.logging.log4j.core.tools Description

Log4j 2 command line tools.
